overview:
Christine Mastrangelo is the Office Manager and Executive Assistant at Cue Ball. As Office Manager, she is responsible for overseeing day-to-day operations, assisting with fund administration, fund communications, and human resources. Most importantly, Christine holds the heroic task of keeping all of our lives sane and on schedule, and we would not be able to do our jobs without her.

Background As a mother of two, fiction writer, and fashion historian, Christine has the rare ability to combine and balance personal, creative, and professional interests and skills. Prior to Cue Ball, Christine worked in senior administration roles at Archemix Corp, a biopharmaceutical company, and also at ICON, an award-winning, Boston-based architecture firm.

Education Boston University, English
